name: Emergency Health Information Card Template
description:
In case of an emergency, you might want to have a card with you that has your emergency information and contacts. This is a printable template for one that you can keep in your wallet. It follows a standard ID size* when exported as a PDF file.


Do you find this useful? Support my work ➔


* ISO/IEC 7810 ID-1 standard of 85.6 x 53.98 mm or 3.4 x 2.1 in
